Code Enforcement
================

Code Enforcement
================

![](data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20width%3D%221920%22%20height%3D%22954%22%20fill%3D%22none%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%3E%3Cg%20clip-path%3D%22url%28%23prefix__clip0_58_35%29%22%3E%3Cpath%20fill-rule%3D%22evenodd%22%20clip-rule%3D%22evenodd%22%20d%3D%22M1773.6-19.976l-600.95%20600.789c-117.27%20117.239-307.318%20117.317-424.491.174-117.172-117.142-117.094-307.145.175-424.383l600.946-600.79%20424.32%20424.21zM1212.47%201397.93l600.95-600.785c117.26-117.238%20117.34-307.241.17-424.384-117.17-117.142-307.22-117.064-424.49.174l-.16.153-600.787%20600.637%20424.317%20424.205z%22%20fill%3D%22rgba%28244%2C245%2C250%2C1%29%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fg%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3CclipPath%20id%3D%22prefix__clip0_58_35%22%3E%3Cpath%20fill%3D%22%23fff%22%20d%3D%22M0%200h1920v954H0z%22%2F%3E%3C%2FclipPath%3E%3C%2Fdefs%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E)

The Code Enforcement Officer is tasked with the enforcement of all city codes for the Health, Safety and Welfare of City of Karnes City.

[Information Reporting Form](https://cityofkctx.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/Reporting-Form-2015.pdf "Code Enforcement Information Reporting Form"): Code and Ordinance Violation forms with Notice of Property Violation letters and pictures of violation. All letters are sent Certified Mail and a letter is sent by regular mail to the property owner or person in charge.

Junk Vehicle notices are sent to registered vehicle owner, and also to the property owner on which the vehicle is located.

![](https://cityofkctx.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/Code-Enforcement-scaled.jpg "METADATA-START")

Events
======

NOTICE OF SEALED BID OPENING  
FOR SALE OF REAL PROPERTY  
The City of Karnes City, Texas (the “City”) is accepting sealed bids for the purchase of the  
following real property (the “Property”) as described in this Notice of Sealed Bid Opening:  
The Property commonly known as 211 E. Calvert, Karnes City, Texas 78118, being legally  
described as consisting of approximately 0.0670 acres of land, KARNES CITY COMMON  
WALL, BLK 20, LOT 16, CITY OF KARNES CITY, KARNES COUNTY, TEXAS. The  
Property contains an existing structure that includes approximately 2,580 sq. ft. of rentable office  
space, as well as an additional 1, 152 sq. ft. of unfinished space on the second story. It is the  
intention of the City to sell the Property based on the best value bid that is submitted. If, in the  
judgment of the City Council, none of the bids submitted represent the fair value of the Property,  
the City reserves the right to reject any and all bids. Should any bid be accepted, payment shall be  
made by earnest money deposit, subject to closing, and shall be deposited with the City or  
designated escrow agent by cashier’s check or money order payable to “City of Karnes City, Texas”  
within ten days of the award notice.  
RECOMMENDED MINIMUM BID: $230,000.00  
The property will be sold “as is” with no warranties or representations as to suitability for any  
particular use. Conveyance of the property will be by special warranty deed. Bids shall be delivered  
in writing, signed by the bidder or an authorized representative, and enclosed in a sealed envelope  
to the City of Karnes City, C/O Veronica Butler, City Manager, 1007 N. Hwy 123, Karnes City,  
Texas 78118. All bids shall be plainly marked “SEALED BID TO PURCHASE REAL  
PROPERTY.” Bids must be received before 4:30 p.m. on July 10, 2025, and any bid received after  
that time will not be considered. City Council will open, read, and tabulate the bids at 6:00 p.m.  
on July 22, 2025, at City Hall, 1007 N. HWY 123, City of Karnes City.  
Bidders may contact Veronica Butler, City Manager, at 830-780-3422 for clarifications and  
questions

CLOSE
